CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1959, pg. 11, reads: "Cited For Community Activity - Mrs. Sophia Bailey Nelson, veteran NAACP worker and ardent civic worker, was awarded the second annual Toki Schalk Johnson Citation for community activity in Pittsburgh. Atty. Henry R. Smith Jr., president of the State NAACP, made the presentation at the mass meeting Sunday at Wesley Center AME Zion Church, the climax of the state convention  of the association. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Women and men, including James O. Dougan sixth from left, gathered on altar in Ebenezer Baptist Church, with choir in background, during NAACP convention meeting
